importantArticles.headline: Rocket Lab USA (NASDAQ: RKLB) has been selected to bid for billions in future launches planned by the United States and United Kingdom.  Investors are excited about the opportunities these selections create, sending Rocket Lab shares up as much as 15% on Tuesday morning and up 9% as of 11:30 a.m. ET.  Rocket Lab is one of several space stocks to emerge in recent years, and the company arguably has done more than anyone else in that class to establish itself as a reliable operator.
importantArticles.title: Why Rocket Lab Is Up Big Today

importantArticles.headline: Market Domination host Josh Lipton and ProShares global investment strategist Simeon Hyman take a closer look at some of today's trending tickers. Netflix (NFLX) stock is gaining after the Wall Street Journal reported the streaming giant is aiming for a $1 trillion market cap and to double revenue by 2030. Rocket Lab (RKLB) stock rises after announcing hypersonic business deals in the US and the UK. American Airlines (AAL) is partnering with AT&T (T) to bring free Wi-Fi to flights for rewards members. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.
importantArticles.title: Netflix, Rocket Lab, American Airlines: Trending Tickers

importantArticles.headline: Shares of aerospace and defense company Rocket Lab (NASDAQ:RKLB) jumped 13.1% in the morning session after the company announced it was selected to provide hypersonic test launch capabilities through its HASTE launch vehicle, along with other related services, under two multi-billion-dollar government development programs for the United States and the United Kingdom.
importantArticles.title: Why Are Rocket Lab (RKLB) Shares Soaring Today

importantArticles.headline: Earnings results often indicate what direction a company will take in the months ahead. With Q4 behind us, let’s have a look at Moog (NYSE:MOG.A) and its peers.
importantArticles.title: Spotting Winners: Moog (NYSE:MOG.A) And Aerospace Stocks In Q4

importantArticles.headline: Josh Lipton examines the trending stories of the trading day on today's Market Minute. Albertsons (ACI) stock is under pressure after the company's full-year earnings outlook fell short of expectations. Bank of America analysts downgraded Dow Inc. (DOW) to Underperform from Buy. Rocket Lab (RKLB) stock gains after announcing new hypersonic business in the US and the UK. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.
importantArticles.title: Albertsons outlook, Dow Inc. downgrade, Rocket Lab hypersonic

importantArticles.headline: Rocket Lab shares jump after being selected for two, multibillion contracts for hypersonic tech from the U.S. and U.K.
importantArticles.title: SpaceX Rival Jumps On Two Hypersonic Testing Contracts

importantArticles.headline: Rocket Lab USA (NasdaqCM:RKLB) recently introduced its new STARRAY solar arrays and Frontier RF Communications Systems, showcasing the company's continuous innovation in satellite technology. The stock price rose by 12% over the last week, partly supported by these product advancements. Concurrently, the company's announcement about its selection by the U.S. Space Force for high-profile national security missions further solidifies its market position and could have contributed to the share...
importantArticles.title: Rocket Lab USA (NasdaqCM:RKLB) Rockets 12% In A Week After U.S. Space Force Selection

importantArticles.headline: LONG BEACH, Calif., April 14, 2025--Rocket Lab USA, Inc. (Nasdaq: RKLB) ("Rocket Lab" or "the Company"), a global leader in launch services and space systems, today announced it has been selected to provide hypersonic test launch capability with its HASTE launch vehicle, engineering expertise, and other services through its participation in two multi-billion dollar government development programs for the United States and the United Kingdom.
importantArticles.title: Rocket Lab Onramped To Multi-Billion Dollar U.S. and U.K. Defense Contracts To Expand Hypersonic Technology Development with HASTE

importantArticles.headline: One single Space Force contract could expand the small company's revenue by nearly 50% annually.
importantArticles.title: How Much Will Rocket Lab Get From the Space Force?

importantArticles.headline: Shares of Rocket Lab (NASDAQ: RKLB) are trading higher this week.  The launch service provider announced a new family of customizable satellite solar arrays at a major industry conference this week, boosting investor optimism.  Rocket Lab announced its new Standardized Array (STARRAY) product line at the 40th Space Symposium in Colorado Springs.
importantArticles.title: Why Rocket Lab Stock Is Skyrocketing This Week

importantArticles.headline: LONG BEACH, Calif., April 08, 2025--Rocket Lab USA, Inc. (Nasdaq: RKLB) ("Rocket Lab" or "the Company"), a global leader in launch services and space systems, today introduced the Company’s family of customizable, next-generation solar arrays, Standardized Array (STARRAY), to meet the diverse power needs of satellites operating in any orbital conditions. The new product line was introduced at the 40th Space Symposium in Colorado Springs, Colorado.
importantArticles.title: Rocket Lab Expands Satellite Solutions with Customizable Solar Arrays
